name: Hourglass of Evolution
description:
Description

Play as a black cat to overcome his nightmares using his magic-imbued hourglass. This hourglass can evolve and devolve the environment around it. Use this hourglass to tackle difficult puzzles.

Controls

Space or Up to JUMP.

Left or Right to MOVE.

Z-X or Mouse Wheel to EVOLVE/DEVOLVE.

R to RESTART.

-The concept of time is unquestionably the most destructive notion mankind ever created. 

-'Time' gives countless lifes. 

-'Time' takes countless lifes. 

-'Time' grinds even mountains to dust. 

-No men shall ever escape from the 'Time'. 

-The end is already written. 

-but no one can also claim that 'Time' will not help lost souls until the 'End'. 

-Time.

Made in 2 days for Tobb Jam #2
